title: Please deal with annie
body:
She has a 56% winrate in the toplane a 56% winrate in the midlane (op.gg). She isn't hard to play, nor is she fun to play against. She remains relevant throughout the entire game regardless of how her laning phase goes, she has access to both targeted and AOE stuns. Tibbers allows her to go even in trades even if she is killed. She does more burst than any assassin.

Can we at least get a response?

replies.body:
dude just play Cho'Gath against her... you get free health with your ult and you sustain her damage with his passive. 
Other solutions include asking your jungler to gank mid so she burns her flash meaning she has to slowly walk up to you to use her ult which is pretty easily telegraphed in her movement. Like, she has really short range. REALLY, REALLY, REALLY SHORT RANGE. SHE CAN BE KITED AND KILLED FROM AFAR WITH ANY LONG RANGE MAGE.

I dont even play midlane. I'm just noting that she is out of line. 

in response to 'she's slow dont let her walk up to you' she almost always builds protobelt, so she can protobelt-flash ulti you and you are dead instantly. Plus, kiting doesnt work because she has targeted CC
I'm just noting she has clear weaknesses that you're refusing to acknowledge :V

Her 'clear weakness' is easily covered up by protobelt. 

I'm acknowledging that her short range is supposed to balance her out, but clearly with 56%winrate in 2 different lanes it doesnt do enough to keep her in line
She has a long refractory period between flash ults and short range so she can't join every team fight and is often stuck in the back waiting
thats where protobelt comes in... its on a 45 second cooldown, no?

Protobelt actually doesn't dash you that far though... it's like a 2/10ths of a Shen dash 
and the last time I checked, flash wason a pretty high cooldown along with her ult
It gives you enough range to click on him with your incinerate, and then close in to ulti and disintegrate them, literally
Well if you're not mid and you're playing top, then just build MR and Health. A fed Annie still won't be able to burst down a bullied negative KDR tanky fighter like Darius. Or Cho'Gath.

I play mainly ADC. 

I'm not saying I dont know how to play against annie, I dont need tips for how to beat her. I'm asking that, when it comes down to facts, she is clearly out of line and needs to be reigned in
then stick with your team and try not to get caught by her. Let your tanks handle her, their base damages should be enough to kill her easily. y'know... it is a team game after all.
Im not getting killed by annie. I already said, I dont need tips. She is however, too strong currently
Nope she is not.

> [{quoted}](name=InsidiousWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pcgAyvPf,comment-id=0004000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-16T17:03:59.051+0000)
>
> I play mainly ADC. 
> 
> when it comes down to facts, she is clearly out of line and needs to be reigned in


{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 


And that is where I don't take you seriously. She is not out of line and does not need nerfs. Riot thinks just the same too so just stop asking.

1. This is my first post asking for an annie nerf
2. Riot has not commented on the current state of annie, so don't claim to speak for them

1) Don't care, I still don't like seeing people posting about things that Riot won't give them anyway.
2) Riot commented on her during the MYMU, and since she hasn't had any changes since then- it's safe to say they like her the way she is. 
3) I can give you the exact words that Riot Beluga Whale said about her Flash+Tibbers+Stun plays if you want, but beware it's long.
She's performing just fine. Maybe others need looking at but not her.
Annie may not have changes, but the game changed drastically. As a result, it may be worth re-evaluating how champions are preforming
55% in mid and 54% in top I really don't see what the issue is. She's an assassin counter and assassins are the new favorite things of the pre-season.
yea i have no problem with annie shes supposed to be an easy champion that counters assassins.
Shes also pretty easy to predict when she is gonna go in.
My only gripe with Annie is that TIbbers seems to have like 50000 movespeed
Can't you just call in your Assassin to eliminate her?
most times the assassin will be the one laning against her, and consequently get knocked out of the game

At ~5-6% play rate, and under 3 % ban rate, I just see a problem. There are a couple of champions with > 5 times that play AND ban, and those are a problem. Annie, by her play/ban rate is apparently neither considered OP nor toxic to play against by most of the community (or they'd be picking or banning her more).

There are worse abusers, sure, but her winrate is too high and she is too easy to play. 

Shaco is almost identlical in winrates across multiple lanes, and he got nerfed for it, wheras annie remains untouched
Yeah, maybe. I'm personally anti-Mid assassins but I was thinking a Kha'Zix, Rengar, or (and I know he's not an assassin) Xin.
yeah but then you are having to pick 2 champs to counter her out, and even then she might just use disintigrate to stun them while they are jumping and then 100-0

>nor toxic to play against by most of the community

I don't think Annie needs nerfs, but let's be real here, she isn't fun to play against.

Her kit is incredibly binary. Either you outrange her or you don't. If you outrange her, there's basically nothing she can do except flash on you. If you don't, she can zone you indefinitely and probably 100-0% you before her undodgable stun wears off. 

Her counterplay is: never get in her range. That's fair counterplay. It's just not that fun.
She is easily countered with range, MR shuts her down hard, she isn't tanky unless she gets ROD.  Focus her in teamfights.  It's really not hard
granted, thats a lot to do, and that doesnt change how much dmg she can do or how infuriatingly simple she is to play, however, people shouldnt just qq lol shes still counterable
you can't argue that she has short range when she rushes protobelt in every game, she can just protobelt in and kill your ass. She is also known for one of the most potent flash-ultis in the game

1) Annie is a counter to mobility, which most mobility abusers are, you guessed it- assassins. So of course she is doing well against them.
2) She is short ranged, very immobile, and easy to take advantage of. Wait for her to use her stun on farming then bam go in on her. Easy as pie.
3) It may be my elo but I have never, EVER, seen an Annie take a protobelt so that argument is irrelevant. Plus it's not that big of a deal even if she got one- it's just like Kennen using it to get in range to ult and saving a flash instead. Flash stun Tibbers or Protobelt stun Tibbers, it's still the same and Riot likes her and her Tibber plays.
4) Riot and the community both think she's doing just fine and is neither toxic or OP. Yes she has burst, yes she can be frustrating, but she's not like all these toxic hoes-{{champion:157}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:64}} and others.
5) Learn to play against her and stop QQing. THANKS.

Every annie build in plat+ uses protobelt

in addition, 'wait until she uses stun to farm' isnt really valid for several reasons. firstly, her problems begin to show in the midgame, when farming is less important. 

I've seen her summon tibbers deal 1.1k by itself, add to that incinerate and disintegrate damage... so even if you bait out her stun it wont matter

Like I said, in my elo I never see it. Plus, protobelt was just nerfed, am I right? Or was it just Kennen nerfed from abusing it, I can't remember. 

Early game you can abuse her when she uses her stun to farm. Late game- stay away from her and build MR.

So? Camille does trillions amounts of true damage from what I've been hearing on the boards. Other champions have high amounts of burst damage. She's just the same. 

She's easy to play because she's one of the few that they use to teach new players how to play. That's why. 

She's not that much of a problem honestly so please stop QQing.
